query.mssql: SELECT eType.id FROM auxo_nccmn_objtype As eType LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Sungero_System_EntityType] As sType ON convert(nvarchar(36), sType.[TypeGuid]) = eType.entityguid WHERE sType.[TypeGuid] IS NULL
query.postgres: SELECT eType.id FROM auxo_nccmn_objtype As eType LEFT JOIN Sungero_System_EntityType As sType ON sType.TypeGuid::text = eType.entityguid WHERE sType.TypeGuid IS NULL
SELECT TypeGuid FROM Sungero_System_EntityType WHERE TypeGuid not in ('{0}')
